sourcesContent:
<template>
    <ShowCatalog @addToCart="addToCart"/>
    -----------------------------------------
    <!-- <ShopMainWrapperVue/> -->
</template>

<script>
import ShowCatalog from '@/components/ShopCatalog'
// import ShopMainWrapperVue from '@/components/ShopMainWrapper'
import { mapActions } from 'vuex';

export default {
    name: 'MainPage',
    components: {
        ShowCatalog,
        // ShopMainWrapperVue
    },
    methods: {
        ...mapActions({
            pushToCart: 'pushToCart'
        }),
        addToCart(value) {
            value['quantity'] = 1;
            // console.log('VALUE IS:', value)
            this.pushToCart(value);
        }
    },
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped></style>
